name: Meta Quest 3
description: Next-gen VR headset with high-resolution display, powerful Snapdragon XR2 Gen 2, and mixed reality features.

name: Meta Quest Pro
description: Premium VR headset with high-fidelity passthrough, eye tracking, and full-color mixed reality.

name: Meta Ray-Ban Smart Glasses
description: Stylish smart glasses with built-in camera, hands-free voice control, and live streaming capabilities.

name: Meta AI Glasses
description: Advanced AI-powered AR glasses with real-time translation and holographic UI.

name: Meta Portal Go
description: Portable smart display for video calls with AI-powered camera tracking and built-in Alexa integration.

name: Meta Portal Plus
description: 10-inch smart display with AI-powered video calling, Alexa, and adaptive screen adjustment.

name: Horizon Worlds
description: A social VR platform that allows users to create, explore, and interact in virtual worlds.

name: Horizon Workrooms
description: A virtual reality meeting space designed for remote work collaboration.

name: Meta AI
description: An AI-powered assistant that integrates into Meta products like WhatsApp, Messenger, and Instagram.

name: Meta Ads Manager
description: A powerful tool for businesses to create, manage, and analyze ads on Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp.

name: Meta Business Suite
description: An all-in-one tool for managing Facebook, Instagram, and Messenger business accounts.

name: Facebook App
description: The world's largest social media platform with billions of users worldwide.

name: Instagram
description: A social media platform for sharing photos, videos, and reels.

name: WhatsApp
description: A widely used instant messaging platform with end-to-end encryption.

name: Messenger
description: A messaging app integrated with Facebook, supporting text, voice, and video calls.

name: Meta Verified
description: A subscription service that provides verification, customer support, and increased reach on Facebook and Instagram.

name: Meta Llama 3
description: A large language model AI designed for businesses and developers.

name: Meta Reality Labs
description: A division focused on VR and AR innovations, including Quest, Portal, and AI glasses.

name: Meta Avatars
description: 3D customizable avatars used across Meta platforms for virtual interactions.

name: Meta Pay
description: A digital payment system integrated with Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp.

name: Meta Connect
description: Meta's annual event showcasing advancements in AR, VR, and AI.
